hiveArticle.title: Single Apple But Two Ideas - The Power of Sharing
hiveArticle.body:
George Bernard Shaw Once Said that “If you have an apple and I have an apple and we exchange these apples then you and I will still each have one apple. But if you have an idea and I have an idea and we exchange these ideas, then each of us will have two ideas.”

This is true because when you lend an idea to someone, tow people will have different thinking to execute that idea which will help to make that idea even bigger.

Thoughts ??
